sentence.Network_en: Hopefully a satisfactory solution can be reached without much blood letting.
sentence.Network_cn: 有望在不引起严重内讧的情况下达成一个满意的解决方案。

sentence.Network_en: I never got a satisfactory answer.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从未得到令我满意的答复。

sentence.Network_en: Theirs had been a happy and satisfactory marriage.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的婚姻曾经一直幸福美满。

Happy | Chinese Dictionary ... 喜色 happy expression;cheerful look 顺心 happy;satisfactory 福地 happy land;paradise.
理发英语 - 文化流氓的日志 - 网易博客 ... temple n． 鬓角 satisfactory n． 满意的 toner n． 调色剂，增色剂.
if my poems can explain or express satisfactory ., 诗词解述如满意.

Ball milling dye and organic liquid give highly satisfactory results ., 球磨了的染料和有机液体可以得到很满意的结果.
Spreadsheet for 600 Characters ... 派别- -faction 美满- -perfectly satisfactory 认识- -to know by acquaitance.

means.word_mean: 充分的,适当的,有能力的,有价值的,好的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'leading to the atonement of sin'): from Old French satisfactoire or medieval Latin satisfactorius, from Latin satisfacere 'to content' (see satisfy). The current senses date from the mid 17th cent

entry.tran: 令人满意的;恰当的;合适的
entry.def: Something that is satisfactory is acceptable to you or fulfils a particular need or purpose.

example.ex: I never got a satisfactory answer...
example.tran: 我从未得到令我满意的答复。

example.ex: It seemed a very satisfactory arrangement...
example.tran: 这似乎是个非常令人满意的安排。

auth_sentence.content: It did not indicate a satisfactory degree of ferocity.
auth_sentence.res_content: It did not indicate a satisfactory degree of ferocity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It did not indicate a satisfactory degree of ferocity.

auth_sentence.content: The obvious option, Ushuaia, was not satisfactory.
auth_sentence.res_content: The obvious option, Ushuaia, was not satisfactory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The obvious option, Ushuaia, was not satisfactory.

auth_sentence.content: Drinking from a straw was hardly more satisfactory.
auth_sentence.res_content: Drinking from a straw was hardly more satisfactory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Drinking from a straw was hardly more satisfactory.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人满意的,圆满的,良好的,符合要求的
令人不满意的, 不能解决问题的, 不得人心的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+satisfactory令人满意的→adj.令人不满意的, 不能解决问题的, 不得人心的
satisfactory[adj.令人满意的,圆满的,良好的,符合要求的]+ly表副词→satisfactorily满意地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不满,不平,令人不满的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: dissatisfy[v.使感觉不满, 不满足]+action表名词→dissatisfaction不满,不平
satisfy[v.满意,使满意,使相信,说服]+action表名词→satisfy的名词→satisfaction满足,满意

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使感觉不满, 不满足
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不+satisfy[v.满意,使满意,使相信,说服]→v.使感觉不满, 不满足

stems_affixes.value_cn: 满意,使满意,使相信,说服

Sentence.sentence: Some parents who withdraw their children from the schools in favor of home schooling have an inadequate educational background and insufficient formal training to provide a satisfactory education for their children.

means.word_mean: 令人满意的, 符合要求的

sentences.en: Sales are very satisfactory this month.
sentences.cn: 本月销售情况令人十分满意。

sentences.en: I hope this arrangement will be satisfactory to you.
sentences.cn: 我希望这种安排会使你满意。

jushi.english: The actress gave a satisfactory performance but could have been better.
jushi.chinese: 那位女演员演得令人满意,但她原本可演得更好。

jushi.english: He could not provide a satisfactory excuse for his absence.
jushi.chinese: 他无法为自己缺席提供令人满意的借口。

jushi.english: After much discussion we came at a conclusion satisfactory to all.
jushi.chinese: 经过充分讨论,我们得出了大家都很满意的结论。
